testcase.classname: Registeration|| user could register to the site
testcase.name: user could register entering valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user click register.....................................................passed When user fills gender"male" fname"automation" lname"tester" day"10" month"9" year"1998" email"test133@gmail.com" valid data.passed And user fills valid password "password" confirm "password".................passed And user clicks register button.............................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: Login|| user could login to the site
testcase.name: user could login with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user click on login.....................................................passed When user enter valid "test133@gmail.com" and valid "password"..............passed And user clicks login button................................................passed Then user logged in successfully............................................passed

testcase.classname: Login|| user could login to the site
testcase.name: user could login with invalid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user click on login.....................................................passed When user enter valid "test11@ail.com" and valid "613"......................passed And user clicks login button................................................passed Then user could not login...................................................passed
